pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exponential-Family Random Network Models // Estimation of fully and partially observed Exponential-Family Random Network Models (ERNM). Exponential-family Random Graph Models (ERGM) and Gibbs Fields are special cases of ERNMs and can also be estimated with the package. Please cite Fellows and Handcock (2012), "Exponential-family Random Network Models" available at doi:10.48550/arXiv.1208.0121.
